descriptionHtml:
So I'm new to modding but I'm trying my best here. :)

Summary:
So this mod adds Ulfrics clothes to Windhelm guards and some Stormcloaks. I recommend using Immersive armor by Hothtrooper44 with this mod so you get the Stormlord set instead.

My thoughts: (LOL)

So I was disappointed with how Stormcloaks only have one armor set. But I found a mod called Immersive armor. But I was still disappointed with how only Ulfric wears the Stormlord Set. :( So I changed the Windhelm guard to wear Ulfrics clothes and some Stormcloaks, thus giving them the Stormlord set with Immersive armor installed, and I thought I'd share it with all of you. :)

DLC Needed:

All.
Sorry but I forgot I did not need them In the CK to make this and I will not be making it again.

Bugs:

Bugs None that I know about.

Compatability:

Should be Compatible with everything. Unless another mod changes Windhelm guard armor or Stormcloak armor. Then it's up to the load-order.
author: Dardemlynn
